articles.title: An Electrician's Warning: Don't Plug These 7 Dangerous Devices Into Extension Cords - CNET
articles.description: Think twice before plugging major appliances into an extension cord, because they aren't built for it.

articles.title: An ‘iPhone Air,’ price hikes and AI: What to watch at Apple’s biggest event of the year - CNN
articles.description: The iPhone needs a shakeup. It could get one as soon as September 9, when Apple is expected to announce an all-new slimmer model of the iPhone, potentially called the “iPhone Air,” alongside the iPhone 17 and new Apple Watch models at its marquee annual event.

articles.title: Apple AirPods Pro 3 LEAKS Reveal INSANE New Features - Geeky Gadgets
articles.description: Discover the AirPods Pro 3 leaks: slimmer case, H3 chip, health sensors, and real-time translation. The future of wireless audio is here!

articles.title: Denny Hamlin reacts to third Cup Series pole of 2025 at Gateway - NASCAR.com
articles.description: Joe Gibbs Racing's Denny Hamlin reacts to winning his second consecutive NASCAR Cup Series Busch Light Pole Award to open the 2025 playoffs.

articles.title: Is Local AI the Unexpected Fix to the Obsolescence of Robot Vacuums? - Gizmodo
articles.description: The Deebot X11 OmniCyclone uses AI to sort out how, where, and when to clean your house—even without an internet connection.
